title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Digital Technology-Based Nursing Simulation Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice knowledge and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Through VR-based simulations, learners perform decision-making processes using digital tools in complex patient management scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Using mobile collaboration tools, learners exchange real-time clinical simulation feedback with peers three or more times to improve communication skills.
Learners can write project reports tracking and evaluating patient condition changes through five or more stages using digital record systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
